abstract: California Department of Motor Vehicles reports over half of driver licenses issued in California in 2015 have gone to people in United States illegally after passage of 2013 law allowing driver's licenses to be issued to undocumented workers.
lead_paragraph: More than half of all new driver’s licenses issued in California this year have gone to people who are in the country illegally, state officials said.

headline.main: Illegal Residents Flock to Get California Licenses
headline.print_headline: Illegal Residents Flock to Get California Licenses

snippet: More than half of all new driver’s licenses issued in California this year have gone to people who are in the country illegally, state officials said.
